lead_paragraph: Dragan Covic, chairman of the three-member presidency, said that the formal application would be handed over on Feb. 15 and that by then Bosnia would try to have fulfilled the last two preconditions.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Bosnia-Herzegovina: Application to European Union Is Nearly Ready
headline.main: Bosnia-Herzegovina: Application to European Union Is Nearly Ready

snippet: Dragan Covic, chairman of the three-member presidency, said that the formal application would be handed over on Feb. 15 and that by then Bosnia would try to have fulfilled the last two preconditions.
abstract: Bosnia is set to formally apply for European Union membership in February.
